MeasurementToolMetadata.Instructions: The questions in this scale ask you about your sleep habits. All questions refer to the previous two weeks.

srsq_01.Description: Do you have trouble getting up in the morning?

srsq_02.Description: Do you feel sleepy during the day?

srsq_03.Description: Are you immediately wide awake when you wake up?

srsq_04.Description: When I am at school or work for a while I have trouble keeping my eyes open

srsq_05.Description: Do you have enough energy during the day to do everything?

srsq_06.Description: I am active during the day

srsq_07.Description: I have to struggle to stay awake in class or at work

srsq_08.Description: I don't feel like going to school or work because I feel too tired

Levels.3: This happens more often than twice a week

srsq_09.Description: I am a person who does not get enough sleep
